subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Felipe Massa said that he would leave Ferrari at the end of the 2013 season, leaving the path clear for Kimi Raikkonen to join the team as the new partner for Fernando Alonso.
snippet: Felipe Massa said that he would leave Ferrari at the end of the 2013 season, leaving the path clear for Kimi Raikkonen to join the team as the new partner for Fernando Alonso.
